General.Name: Artemis Gold Inc
General.Description: Artemis Gold Inc., a gold development company, focuses on the identification, acquisition, and development of gold properties. The company holds equity ownership interest in Velocity Minerals Ltd. that focus on exploration and development of gold properties in Bulgaria. It also holds 100% interest in the Blackwater Gold Project located in central British Columbia. Artemis Gold Inc. was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 595 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7X 1L3
